title: Biden to Nominate Caroline Kennedy as Ambassador to Australia
sub_head: The president is also nominating Olympic figure skating medalist Michelle Kwan as ambassador to Belize
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden will nominate Caroline Kennedy to be U.S. ambassador to Australia, the White House said Wednesday.
Ms. Kennedy, the daughter of the late President John F. Kennedy, served as U.S. ambassador to Japan in the Obama administration. Ms. Kennedy said that she would work to “improve global health and increase vaccine access during this terrible pandemic and to address the urgent climate crisis.”
